layout_strategies.landing_hero: Full-screen (h-screen) relative container. Background image with heavy black gradient overlay (bg-gradient-to-t from-[#050505] via-[#050505]/80 to-transparent). Text placed at bottom-left or center-bottom. Massive typography (text-6xl md:text-9xl).
layout_strategies.bento_grid: Grid layout with 'Tetris' logic. Mix of col-span-1, col-span-2, row-span-2 items. No perfect symmetry.
layout_strategies.marketplace_grid: Dense grid (grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4). Images take up 80% of card height. Minimal text below.
layout_strategies.navigation: Fixed bottom or distinct left sidebar. Avoid top navbar if possible, or make it transparent and minimal (Logo left, Menu right).

technical_instructions.backend_constraint: USE LOCALSTORAGE JSON DATABASE ONLY. IGNORE server.py. This is a strict constraint from the client.
technical_instructions.styling_engine: TailwindCSS with 'class' strategy for dark mode (forced dark)
technical_instructions.animations: Framer Motion (if available) or CSS Transitions

implementation_steps: 1. Setup Tailwind config for dark mode colors and fonts.
2. Create a 'Layout' component that enforces the dark theme wrapper (min-h-screen bg-[#050505] text-white).
3. Implement the 'AuthContext' using LocalStorage to mock login/signup.
4. Build the 'Hero' section with the selected background image and parallax effect.
5. Develop the 'Rides' feature using a mock JSON data in LocalStorage.
6. Build the 'Marketplace' grid with hover effects on product cards.
7. Create the 'Profile' page with user stats and history.
universal_guidelines: Do NOT use white backgrounds. Ever.
Do NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use a condensed font.
Do NOT use default rounded corners (rounded-lg). Use sharp edges (rounded-none) or very subtle (rounded-sm) for a 'tech' feel.
Use 'Performance Red' (#E10600) sparingly. Only for primary actions and active states.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background.
